Name: Hell's Gate - Slide Puzzle
About the game: Relax, if you can, solving challenging puzzles with dark and bizarre images, while listening to the crying and gnashing teeth of hell. Move the blocks, clicking on them, until you can form the image. There are 8 challenging puzzles based on dark works of art. Feel yourself in hell with the soundtrack of crying, whips, demons and screams of despair!
